mapper.update:
update SMS
SMS_HOSTNAME = #{smsHostname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SMS_UPDATETIME = #{smsUpdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SMS_SERVICESTATE = #{smsServicestate,jdbcType=CHAR},
SMS_STARTTIME = #{smsStarttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SMS_PID = #{smsPid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SMS_CPU = #{smsCpu,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SMS_CPU_THRESHOLD = #{smsCpuThreshold,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SMS_RAM = #{smsRam,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SMS_RAM_THRESHOLD = #{smsRamThreshold,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SMS_THREADS = #{smsThreads,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SMS_THREADS_ACTIVE = #{smsThreadsActive,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SMS_THREADS_THRESHOLD = #{smsThreadsThreshold,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SMS_STOPTIME = #{smsStoptime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SMS_OTHERS = #{smsOthers,jdbcType=CLOB},
where SMS_SERVICENAME = #{smsServicename,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and SMS_SERVICEIP = #{smsServiceip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
